api_list.name: User summary
api_list.description: Returns the user's document status summary
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://opa-test.p.rapidapi.com/user.summary"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "opa-test.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
